mapper.update: update tbl_board set btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bstarttime, bendtime, bhit from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, bhit desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bstarttime, bendtime, bhit from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bstarttime, bendtime, bhit from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
